NO.CAS-8(4)/2004/DIV.I(RA) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated:     12 /01/2009 
 
AVSEC ORDER NO.  01 /2009 
 
 
Subject:-  Regulated Agent Cargo Security Programme 
 
Commissioner of Security (Civil Aviation), Bureau of Civil Aviation 
Security, in exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of Aircraft Act 1934 
delegated to him vide Government of India, Ministry of Civil Aviation Notification 
No. 1797 dated July 3, 1997 for the purpose of securing the safety of aircraft 
operation directs that :- 
 
(i) 
All Regulated Agents, certified by the BCAS, shall file their Security 
Programme, in the format  attached, within 30 days from the date of 
issue of this AVSEC Order, for approval by BCAS;  
 
(ii) 
Any agency intending to be registered / certified by BCAS for 
Regulated Agents shall file their Security Programme for approval 
by appropriate authority prior to such certification / registration; and 
 
(iii) 
Certificate / permits of such Regulated Agents will be cancelled 
who fail to comply with this order. 
 
 
Encl : As above. 
 
 
( D.S.Chauhan )  
IPS 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
